Kevin is a landscape- and agro-ecologist who is also trained in landscape architecture. He uses his unique background to take a data-driven approach to sustainable design. His work aims to make environmental data accessible and actionable for communities and decision makers. He has expertise in geographic information systems (GIS), statistical analysis, and data visualization, as well as hands-on ecological restoration, stewardship, and landscape design.

Through his research and consulting work, Kevin is dedicated to creating landscapes that meet human and ecological needs and foster resilient communities for people and nature.
